content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The journey of EPAM began in 1993 with 3 developers, 1 small office in Minsk, Belarus and 1 client. Arkadiy Dobkin and Leo Lozner opened a startup and began to develop it locally. Since then, the company has grown tremendously and in 1999 the history of Testing at EPAM began. It started with a job interview between Arkadiy Dobkin and Igor Ovsyanik – the founder of Software Testing Division in Belarus. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Every day the team released different parts of the product, tried to install it on test computers as quickly as possible to start testing, learned everything on the go and worked a lot. The first members of the Quality Engineering team – \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Igor_Ovsyanik?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Igor Ovsyanik\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Marina_Minchenkova?tab=wall\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Marina Minchenkova\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/ui/epam/people/person/view/aaf3116b-36a5-44ac-8d90-d09609a81ff0?tab=profile&category=all\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Oleg Shevchuk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Siarhei_Semikalenau?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Siarhei Semikalenau\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Ivan_Kravchenko?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ivan Kravchenko\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" gradually built relationships with developers. The testing team was very proud of their work and the result because the product had been getting better & better. This is how the story began.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":31748,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/93cc0b94-73c8-4de5-98a0-81dd1ce3568d/History 1.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/93cc0b94-73c8-4de5-98a0-81dd1ce3568d/History 1.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"History 1.jpg\",\"name\":\"History 1.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"93cc0b94-73c8-4de5-98a0-81dd1ce3568d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":438,\"height\":305},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"When EPAM set up a testing department in 1999, the main company customer was Firepond. It had its own e\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\"}}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"-\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"#498205\"}}},{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-underlined\",\"data\":{}}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"commerce system that had various industrial solutions for high-tech, healthcare and the automotive industry.\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\"}}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":31571,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c5db8413-7a63-4f17-bd57-fd325ff46f97/History3.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/c5db8413-7a63-4f17-bd57-fd325ff46f97/History3.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"History3.jpg\",\"name\":\"History3.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"c5db8413-7a63-4f17-bd57-fd325ff46f97\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":434,\"height\":328},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM developed fast, testing department grew and already in 2003, 33 employees worked there. In mid-2003, when \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Yury_Antaniuk?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Yury Antaniuk\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\" replaced \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Igor_Ovsyanik?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Igor Ovsyanik\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", as the head of the department, the team had already been about 50 people. By 2005, the department had almost 300 employees and it was renamed to Software Testing Division. At this stage the team consisted of professionals in functional testing, performance optimization, automation testing and others and various competencies began to form.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":124543,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6fc5aa88-f6ca-4764-9e84-90bfae3fd3de/History4.jpg?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/6fc5aa88-f6ca-4764-9e84-90bfae3fd3de/History4.jpg?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"History4.jpg\",\"name\":\"History4.jpg\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"jpeg\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"subtypeSuffix\":null,\"charset\":null,\"concrete\":true},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"6fc5aa88-f6ca-4764-9e84-90bfae3fd3de\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":456,\"height\":342},\"extension\":\"jpg\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Over the years, the company has grown several times. Of course, since then more and more new customers appeared and they believed in us. Let us complete the story with a quote from \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/Ruslan_Mianzelen?tab=profile\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Ruslan Mianzelen\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\": “Our main trend is that we always do our best, always achieve our goals, no matter what. And the way the company copes with the challenges, especially in recent years is the proof  of It and the proof that our people are and always will be the most valuable asset .”\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Change never ends, now we are Quality Engineering Network, but we strive to preserve and develop our heritage. We have engineers with 20 years of experience across the world as well as our own training program for young professionals. Quality Engineering Network today is a highly organized team of professionals in their field.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-span-mark\",\"data\":{\"style\":{\"mso-ascii-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-fareast-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-hansi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"mso-bidi-font-family\":\"Calibri\",\"color\":\"black\",\"mso-themecolor\":\"text1\"}}}]}]}]}}"
